mainwindow module¶

Create a window for displaying frame and its properties

The main companent of usbcamGUI consists of main window with PySide2. Frame from camera are shown on the windows.

class mainwindow.Window(device: int = 0, suffix: str = 'png', camtype: str = 'usb_cam', color: str = 'RGB', dst: str = '.', param: str = 'full', rule: str = 'Sequential', parent=None)¶

Bases: PySide2.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Class to create main widnow

Creates main window for displaying frame read from a connected camera. The main window contains memu bar, tool bar, status bar, sliders and the boxes showing the camera’s information. These widget are created and added to main window in the instance method of this class.

add_actions()¶

Add actions executed when press each item in the memu window.

add_buttons()¶

Add push buttons on the window.

Add quit, save stop and usage buttons on the windows. When press each button, the set method (called “slot” in Qt framework) are execeuted.

add_menubar()¶

Create menu bar, then add to the main window.

add_params() → PySide2.QtWidgets.QGridLayout¶

Set the properties of camera parameter.

Set the properties of camera parameter, then add sliders to change each parameter. When change value on the slider, the value of paramter also changes by the caller function.

add_prop_window() → PySide2.QtWidgets.QGridLayout¶

Create a table to show the current properties of camera.

Returns

PySide2 QGridLayout

Return type

QGridLayout

add_slider(param: str)¶

Creates slider, labels to show pamarater’s name and its value.

Parameters

param (str) – A parameter to create slider.

add_statusbar()¶

Create status bar, then add to the main window.

The status bar shows the coordinates on the frame where the cursor is located and its pixel value. The pixel value has RGB if the format of is color (RGB), does grayscale value if grayscale.

adjust_windowsize()¶

Adjusts the main window size

convert_frame()¶

Convert the class of frame

Create qimage, qpixmap objects from ndarray frame for displaying on the window.

create_action(text: str, slot: Callable, key: Optional[str] = None, checkable: bool = False, check_defalut: bool = False) → PySide2.QtWidgets.QAction¶

Create a QAction object.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text shown on menu.

  • slot (Callable) – A method called when click the menu.

  • key (str, optional) – Shortcut key. Defaults to None.

  • checkable (bool, optional) – Add a checkbox into the menu. Defaults to False.

  • check_defalut (bool, optional) – Check default status. Defaults to False.

Returns

PySide2 QAction

Return type

QAction

create_button(text: str, slot: Callable, key: Optional[str] = None, icon: Optional[icon.Icon] = None, tip: Optional[str] = None, checkable: bool = False, minsize: Optional[tuple] = None) → PySide2.QtWidgets.QPushButton¶

Create a QPushButton object.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text shown on the button.

  • slot (Callable) – A method called when click the button.

  • key (str, optional) – Shortcut key. Defaults to None.

  • icon (Icon, optional) – An icon shown on the button. Defaults to None.

  • tip (str, optional) – A tips shown when position the pointer on the button. Defaults to None.

  • checkable (bool, optional) – Add button to checkbox. Defaults to False.

  • msize (tuple, optional) – Minimum size of the button box, (width, height).

Returns

PySide2 QPushButton

Return type

QPushButton

create_information_layout()¶

Creates information part layout

upper-left: current properties upper-right: buttons lower: sliders

create_mainlayout()¶

Create the main layout which consists of view area and information window.

create_view_area_layout() → PySide2.QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout¶

Creates view area layout

delete_layout(layout)¶

Delete layout

Parameters

layout (QBoxLayout) – QBoxLayout class object to delete

display()¶
get_cam() → str¶

Return camera object according to current OS.

Detects what OS you are using, return camera objects in order to function properly.

  • Linux: LinuxCamera

  • RaspberryPi OS: RaspiCamera

  • Windows: WindowsCamera

Returns

Camera object

get_coordinates(event)¶

Show the current coordinates and value in the pixel where the cursor is located.

The status bar is updates by the obtained values.

get_properties() → list¶

Get the current camera properties.

Returns

parameters. fourcc, width, height, fps.

Return type

list

get_screensize()¶

Get current screen size from the output of linux cmd xrandr.

image_setup()¶

Creates a Qimage to assign frame, then initialize with an image which has zero in all pixels.

information_window_setup()¶

Creates information window.

Creates the information window where the event related to camera or window.

keyPressEvent(event)¶

Exit the program

This method will be called when press the Escape key on the window.

layout_setup()¶

Set layout of objects on the window.

next_frame()¶

Get next frame from the connected camera.

Get next frame, set it to the view area and update.

record()¶

Start or end recording

save_frame()¶

Save the frame on the window as an image.

save_frame_manual(*args, **kwargs)¶
set_param_default()¶

Sets all paramters to default.

set_sliderval(param: str, value: int)¶

Changes a camera parameter.

Updates the label on the right of the slider if input value is valid.

Parameters

  • param (str) – A camera parameter

  • value (int) – its value

set_theme()¶

Set color theme of the main window.

set_timer()¶

Set QTimer

Creates a QTimer object to update frame on view area. The interval is set to the inverse of camera FPS.

setup()¶

Setup the main window for displaying frame and widget.

Creates a QMainWindow object, then add menubar, toolbar, statusbar, widgets and layout into the window.

start_timer()¶

Activate the Qtimer object.

staticMetaObject = <PySide2.QtCore.QMetaObject object>¶
stop_frame(checked: bool)¶

Stop reading next frame.

Parameters

checked (bool) – True when presse the Stop button (toggle on). False when press again (toggel off).

stop_timer()¶

Deactivate the Qtimer object.

toolbar_setup()¶

Create toolbar

update_mainlayout()¶

Recreate the main layout.

update_params(plist: list) → PySide2.QtWidgets.QGridLayout¶

Update camera’s paramters and sliders shown on the windows.

update_prop_table()¶

Updates the table that shows the camera properties.

view_setup()¶

Set view area to diplay read frame in part of the main window

write_text(text: str, level: str = 'info', color: Optional[str] = None)¶

Writes the message into information window.ArithmeticError

Parameters

  • text (str) – A text to write.

  • level (str, optional) – Log lebel of the message. Defaults to “info”.

  • color (str, optional) – Font color. Defaults to None.
